name: A Busca pelo irmão perdido
description:
Lumine, a brave girl, was separated from her brother by an unknown goddess and woke up in another world. She starts a journey through this world. During the journey, Lumine finds herself in two situations: resolving conflicts between gods and nations and finding the whereabouts of her missing brother.

Play to discover the end of this plot.

Programmed in TWINE and the scenes and characters were created in GACHA LIFE.
